name: Smart Business Diplomacy
membership: Hanna Zvolikevych, Executive director of SBD, acts as representative of the Ukrainian private energy company DTEK and works closely with Euracoal, Eurelectric, EFET, EEF
goal: The activities of the company are to provide the services on representing the interest of the foreign companies at the international organizations and at the international events in Brussels, in the European Union institutions with the aim to establish and develop the networking with the European Union institutions, industrial associations, businesses on behalf of such foreign companies.
interests: Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Energy Union package, security of supply (electricity and gas), follow-up of COPs and Paris agreement, Energy Community, renewables, energy efficiency, new energy market design, EU Neighbourhood policy, environment policy and regulation, Clean Energy for All Europeans Package; CESEC initiative; sustainable finance; CRiTP; Clean Planet for All; Just Energy Transition
